00027         enum CharacterClass {
00028             Ctrl = 0,   // Control character
00029             Non = 1,    // Non-Thai character
00030             Cons = 2,   // Consonant
00031             LV = 3,     // Leading Vowel
00032             FV1 = 4,    // Following Vowel, Type 1
00033             FV2 = 5,    // Following Vowel, Type 2
00034             FV3 = 6,    // Following Vowel, Type 3
00035             BV1 = 7,    // Below Vowel, Type 1
00036             BV2 = 8,    // Below Vowel, Type 2
00037             BD = 9,     // Below Diacritic
00038             Tone = 10,  // Tone
00039             AD1 = 11,   // Above Diacritic, Type 1
00040             AD2 = 12,   // Above Diacritic, Type 2
00041             AD3 = 13,   // Above Diacritic, Type 3
00042             AV1 = 14,   // Above Vowel, Type 1
00043             AV2 = 15,   // Above Vowel, Type 2
00044             AV3 = 16    // Above Vowel, Type 3
00045         };

00051             Control = 2     
00052         };
